title: Berkshire Hathaway Cash Pile Hits $350 Billion – Buffett's Biggest War Chest Ever
shortdescription: Oracle of Omaha now holds more cash than Apple's market cap — waiting for the perfect deal.
description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has amassed an unprecedented $350 billion in cash and short-term Treasury bills — the largest cash position in corporate history.
author: Mark Blaze

title: Millennials Face $1.2 Trillion Retirement Savings Gap – Average 401(k) Balance Below $50K
shortdescription: Generation X and Millennials are critically behind on retirement savings — experts warn of coming crisis.
description: The average 401(k) balance for workers aged 35-44 is just $48,000 — far below the $200,000 experts recommend by age 40.
author: Mark Blaze

title: Robo-Advisors Overtake Traditional Financial Advisors – Fees Drop 70% Since 2020
shortdescription: AI-powered investment platforms now manage $8 trillion — traditional advisors struggle to compete.
description: Robo-advisors have fundamentally transformed the investment advisory industry, managing over $8 trillion in assets and slashing fees by an average of 70%.
author: Mark Blaze
